snippet.title: Gangs of Sherwood | 17 minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description:
Take a deeper dive into the world of Gangs of Sherwood with this exciting 17 minutes gameplay video.

Join us as we explore two chapters: 'The Fall of Locksley' and 'Edwinstowe.' In this video, we showcase two of the four playable characters, Robin and Tuck, each with their unique playstyles.

Robin delivers fast-paced gameplay, skillfully using long-range attacks to shoot deadly arrows, keeping enemies at a distance. Meanwhile, Tuck adopts a more brutish approach, unleashing devastating close combat strikes with his massive Sledgehammer, obliterating everything around him.
Prepare for an immersive experience as we navigate through these chapters, witnessing the dynamic gameplay and discovering the intricacies of Robin and Tuck's abilities.

Gangs of Sherwood is coming this Fall on Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC. 

Fight the armies of the Sheriff of Nottingham and lead the rebellion, solo or in co-op with up to 4 players. 

Play as one of the Merry Men, combine your attacks, and free the people in this futuristic dystopia inspired by the legend of Robin Hood. 

_________________________________________________________________

Join the Merry Men on Twitter
https://twitter.com/GangsofSherwood
